title.rendered: 6 Pancras building for BNP Paribas, London, United Kingdom

content.rendered:
The complex, designed by Jean-Michel Wilmotte, meets the highest international environmental and comfort standards and aims to achieve BREEAM Excellent rating.

Located at the heart of a 743,200 sq. metre mixed-use development, the accessible 6 Pancras building is just steps away from Saint Pancras International railway station, where national railways, Eurostar and six London underground lines intersect.

excerpt.rendered: In London’s King’s Cross neighbourhood, VINCI Construction UK has built a complex for BNP Paribas Real Estate Property Development UK comprising 40,000 m² of office space with shops on the ground floor.
